titleStmt.title: Bochim. Sighs poured out by some troubled hearts, and tendred towards continuing the precious savour of the good name of the late worthy man of God, John Vernon, who having faithfully served his generation, and finished his testimony, by the will of God, fell asleep the twenty ninth day of the third month, 1667.
titleStmt.author: J. B.

titleStmt.title: Bochim. Sighs poured out by some troubled hearts, and tendred towards continuing the precious savour of the good name of the late worthy man of God, John Vernon, who having faithfully served his generation, and finished his testimony, by the will of God, fell asleep the twenty ninth day of the third month, 1667.
titleStmt.author: J. B.

notesStmt.note: A collection of elegies, anagrams, etc. on John Vernon, each signed with a different set of initials.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
